physical_appearance: The image shows a colour photograph. It is rectangular and it features a building that is light pink in colour. It has two roofed segments and numerous windows. There are a couple of people standing at the entrance of the building. The foreground of the photograph displays greenery, and there are some tall trees as well.
title_text: Outram Road Jail Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Colour photography Outram Road Prison (Outram, Singapore)
